title: Alice's Adventures in Wonderland
author: Lewis Carroll
text: Alice was beginning to get very tired of sitting by her sister on the bank...

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
text: It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single man in possession of a good fortune, must be in want of a wife...

title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
author: Arthur Conan Doyle
text: To Sherlock Holmes she is always _the_ woman...

title: Frankenstein; Or, The Modern Prometheus
author: Mary Wollstonecraft Shelley
text: You will rejoice to hear that no disaster has accompanied the commencement of an enterprise which you have regarded with such evil forebodings...

title: The Yellow Wallpaper
author: Charlotte Perkins Gilman
text: It is very seldom that mere ordinary people like John and myself secure ancestral halls for the summer...
